title: 148862224.almost 2 Billion Up For Grabs
excerpt: It’s true, there's never been a better time to start a business, to bootstrap your way to success, or to create leverage out of nothing.

children.text: It’s true, there's never been a better time to start a business, to bootstrap your way to success, or to create leverage out of nothing.
Sure, you could try to get rich by betting solely on the literal equivalent of trying to get struck by lightning twice in a day.
Or you can invest your time and money and effort in making something far more rewarding than a bank account with 9 zeros.
